title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; run and chat with models from Node or the browser.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models; use local LLMs in LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, multi-model chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, embed with local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for Ollama; interactive chat, model management, completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM completions via Ollama; inline suggestions & chat pane.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama; local LLM generators & chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with C#.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama; CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom GGUF models ready for Ollama; includes prompts & Modelfiles.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma; ingest PDFs and chat locally.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, Rust, Swift, PHP, Elixir, etc.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All UI now supports Ollama backends; switch between local LLM providers.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot powered by Ollama; slash commands, thread chats, model picker.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package for Ollama; declarative installs on NixOS with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; async tokio client, generate & chat endpoints.
